name: Forged Sand Javelineer
description:
A valiant warrior of the canyon, and a tribal guardian that patrols the crystal mountains and rivers.
In an era when the ridges were shattered and the tribes needed to rebuild, the warriors used javelins as markers to determine the locations on both sides of the canyon from which passages should be dug. That meant that each javelin had to be sunk deep into the rock.

investigation.name: Sauroform Tribal Warriors
investigation.description: The warriors of Natlan's six great tribes who fight for the honor and glory of their people.\nOver long years of living and fighting alongside their Saurian companions, these tribal warriors have gradually acquired their traits and learned how to apply them on the field of battle.
